```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
#Import data
myFile <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shravanisamala/Mount_Everest_Project/master/Mt_Everest_Ascent_Data.csv"

MountEverestData <- read.csv(myFile)
head(MountEverestData)

MountEverestData <- 
  MountEverestData %>%
  rename(Peak = Peak., 
         Name = Name., 
         Yr.Seas = Yr.Seas., 
         Date = Date., 
         Time = Time., 
         Citizenship = Citizenship., 
         Sex = Sex., 
         Age = Age., 
         Oxy = Oxy., 
         Dth = Dth., 
         Host = Host.)
  
#head(MountEverestData)
MountEverestData$Dth <- ifelse(MountEverestData$Dth == "Y", 1, 0)
```
